title: International Paralympic Committee
summary: Sponsoring Strength, Perseverance and Determination Through the International Paralympic Committee
tag-2: Sponsoring Strength, Perseverance and Determination Through the International Paralympic Committee
tag-3: In 2018, Citi announced a global, mission-led partnership with the International Paralympic Committee. Through the partnership, Citi aims to raise awareness for the Paralympic Movement, support Paralympic athletes, and advocate for societal change in perceptions around disability.
